mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select plan_used.plan_used_idx idx,plan.plan_name subject,plan_used.plan_start writedate,plan_used.plan_type gender,used_vip.plan_end deadline,used_vip.used_vip_floor grade,trunc(used_vip.plan_end-sysdate) com_idx from plan_used,used_vip,plan where plan_used.plan_used_idx=used_vip.plan_used_idx and plan.idx=plan_used.plan_idx and plan_used.member_idx=#{idx} order by plan_used.plan_used_idx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into used_vip values( used_vip_idx.nextval, plan_used_idx_se.currval, #{member_idx}, sysdate+#{plan_end}, #{used_vip_floor} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from plan_used where plan_type='VIP' and status='활성' and member_idx=#{idx}

select plan_used.plan_idx,plan.plan_name plan_type,plan_used.plan_start,used_vip.plan_end,trunc(used_vip.plan_end-sysdate) idx from plan,plan_used,used_vip where plan.idx=plan_used.plan_idx and plan_used.plan_used_idx=used_vip.plan_used_idx and plan_used.status='활성' and plan_used.member_idx=#{idx}
select used_count from used_up where member_idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update used_up set used_count=used_count-1 where member_idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select plan_used.plan_used_idx idx,plan.plan_name subject,plan_used.plan_start writedate,plan_used.plan_type gender,used_up.used_count com_idx from plan_used,used_up,plan where plan_used.plan_used_idx=used_up.plan_used_idx and plan.idx=plan_used.plan_idx and plan_used.member_idx=#{idx} order by plan_used.plan_used_idx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
